siteMetadata.title: Trafikito - monitor output of any command
siteMetadata.author: Lukas Liesis

markdownRemark.excerpt: At Trafikito you can monitor several servers at once. Whether you have a database running on 3 servers, a web application on another, some caching on the next…
markdownRemark.html:
At Trafikito you can monitor several servers at once. Whether you have a database running on 3 servers, a web application on another, some caching on the next or maybe several projects and microservices running on different machines. The bottom line is you need to monitor several different machines at once. With Trafikito you can combine all servers in a single workspace and have a great overview of all your servers at once.

A Workspace is like a container for several monitors. A single workspace contains:

  1. Servers to monitor
  2. Members

Servers Management

The Initial view of any workspace is your list of servers. In this list, you can see how all of your servers are doing. On the left, you can see the overall status and It may be:

  1. Everything’s ok
  2. At least one monitored value is in the warning range
  3. At least one monitored value is in an error range

This list refreshes automatically per minute to ensure the overview is current.

Also, you have the option of adding more servers, viewing Trafikito installation instructions and removing a server. This is all done in the same clean list of servers in the selected workspace.

Members Management

The Free plan allows only one member in a workspace but with the paid plans you can add up to 30 members. Also, you can be a member of several workspaces at once. After registering, you automatically get the default workspace but you can delete or make changes if you desire.

The User that creates a workspace automatically becomes the owner of it and any new user will have the role of a member.

frontmatter.title: What is a workspace?

post.excerpt: Workspaces can have only one owner at any given time but may have one or more admins.

frontmatter.title: Can a workspace have several owners & admins?

post.excerpt: Yes, you can. You can join several workspaces at once.

frontmatter.title: Can I be a member of several workspaces at once?

post.excerpt: No.  Paid invoices are in view only mode and can not be edited or removed.

frontmatter.title: Can I edit a paid invoice?

frontmatter.title: Can I get a refund?

post.excerpt: Yes.  Trafikito has a great  free plan  orientated to individuals or one-person companies. The Free plan will provide you with a great…

frontmatter.title: Can I use Trafikito for free?

post.excerpt: Yes,  you can. Just ensure that the billing profile is filled out with the company details.

frontmatter.title: Can I get an invoice for a company?

post.excerpt: There is no one way to get a discount coupon. We release from time to time in different ways. During special events or random days that we may announce giveaways on our dashboard or homepage.

frontmatter.title: How can I get a discount coupon?

post.excerpt: The loyalty program allows you to save money on paid plans; especially for users who use Trafikito for an extended period of time. Also, it is permanent and can be added to other discounts. The maximum sum of all discounts is 50%.

frontmatter.title: How does the loyalty program work?

post.excerpt: You can generate a new invoice that's due or get already paid invoices at the pricing tab in the workspace configuration dialog. Follow these steps to find an invoice:

frontmatter.title: How can I get my invoice?

post.excerpt: Only active members can login to the workspace. Owners cannot be deactivated. To deactivate a member from the active workspace, follow these steps:

frontmatter.title: How to activate/deactivate a member from the workspace?

post.excerpt: Workspaces may have from 1 to 30 members. To add a new member you must have an admin role or owner role and you will need to add the person’s email.

frontmatter.title: How to add a new member to the workspace?

post.excerpt: On the servers list, above all of the servers, click on the current workspace and in the workspace tab you will find the drop-down to switch to another workspace or create a new one.

frontmatter.title: How to add a new workspace?

post.excerpt: There are 3 member roles: owner, admin, and member. Owners and admins can switch the role of any user between an admin and member. Members cannot make any updates. Only the owner can set a new owner. To change the role of any member, follow these steps:

frontmatter.title: How to change member roles?

post.excerpt: A default <wiki>notification</wiki> email is the same email that was used by the person who created the workspace. You can change this email to anything at any time.

frontmatter.title: How to change a default notification email?

post.excerpt:
1.  Open the main menu on the top left \[menu icon\]
2.  Select **Dashboard**
3.  On top of the servers list, you can see the name of the selected workspace. Click it to open more details
4.  On the top select the **Workspace** tab
5.  Check if the **Workspace settings** are expanded and edit the **Workspace name**
6.  To save the changes click **Save workspace**

frontmatter.title: How to change the workspace name?

post.excerpt:
1.  Open the main menu on the top left \[menu icon\]
2.  Select **Dashboard**
3.  On top of the servers list, you can see the name of the selected workspace. Click it to open more details
4.  On the top select the **Workspace** tab
5.  Check if the **Billing profile** is expanded
6.  Make the required changes
7.  To save the changes click **Save workspace**

frontmatter.title: How to change the billing profile?

post.excerpt: Basic workspace settings can be found by following these steps:

frontmatter.title: How to change the workspace settings?

post.excerpt:
1.  Make sure you have at least one active server in the free workspace. Each day you will get 0.02% for it.
2.  If you work in a company, recommend Trafikito to monitor their servers and when they buy a paid plan you will get your extra personal discount each day.
3.  Join several companies and suggest Trafikito to them. You will get an extra 0.04% everyday for each.

frontmatter.title: How to quickly earn personal discounts?
